text: Bez struje is a various artists live album, released in 1994, recorded on the unplugged festival held in 1994 in Sava Centar, Belgrade, Serbia. The album features eighteen Serbian (mostly rock) acts. ==Track listing== ==References== *Bez struje at Discogs ==External links== * Category:Pop rock albums by Serbian artists Category:Reggae albums by Serbian artists Category:Blues rock albums by Serbian artists Category:1994 live albums Category:Pop rock compilation albums Category:Blues compilation albums Category:Reggae compilation albums Category:Serbian-language albums
title: Bez struje
